results.title: An acid test for metformin .
results.text_hl: In a recent issue of this journal, Van der Vreken, Oudaert I and colleagues showed that @CHEMICAL_syrosingopine @CHEMICAL_MESH:C084824 @@@syrosingopine@@@, together with another drug @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, had a synergistic effect in killing cultured @<m>DISEASE_Multiple_Myeloma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009101 @@@multiple myeloma@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Multiple_Myeloma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009101 @@@MM@@@) cell lines, primary @<m>DISEASE_Multiple_Myeloma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009101 @@@MM@@@ blasts from @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@, and in a @SPECIES_10090 @@@mouse@@@ @<m>DISEASE_Multiple_Myeloma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009101 @@@MM@@@ model.

results.title: Metabolic Disorders in Multiple Myeloma
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ decreases the availability of @CHEMICAL_Adenosine_Triphosphate @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000255 @@@ATP@@@ for the damage repair response in @<m>DISEASE_Multiple_Myeloma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009101 @@@myeloma@@@ cells, which in turn leads them in increased apoptosis.
